turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, could you help me with placing an order at Bella Luna Pizzeria?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like four small pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the first pizza, I just want plain cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the second pizza, I would like mushrooms and onions.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the third pizza, I would like ham and pineapple.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And on the fourth pizza, I would like pepperoni and black olives.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 small pizzas, 1 cheese, 1 mushroom and onions, 1 ham and pineapple, 1 pepperoni and black olives, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $52, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's fine. But I wanted the crust to be thin on those pizzas. Does that raise the price?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i can add that, thin crust does not change the price.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, that's great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine-in, pick-up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 35 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, you've helped plenty today. Thank you so much for everything.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your welcome, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks. I will.
